titles: A true relation of the life and death of Sir Andrew Barton, a pyrate and rover on the seas. Tune, Come follow my love, &c.
publisher: Printed by and for W.O. and sold by the booksellers of Pye-corner and London-bridge.,
notes: Imprint from colophon; publication date from Wing.
Verse: "When Flora with her fragrant flowers ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Barton, Andrew, d. 1511 --  Early works to 1800.
